item.title: 埃克森美孚就完成出售德国重要炼油厂股份进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃克森美孚公司正在与其他股东进行深入谈判，为出售德国第二大炼油厂的股份铺平道路。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is in advanced talks with other shareholders to pave the way for its sale of a stake in Germany’s second-biggest refinery, which was halted after a court ruling earlier this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 普拉博沃计划重新任命多名现任内阁部长
item.description: 印度尼西亚当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）表示，他的内阁可能由在现任领导人佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）领导下的 "许多部长 "组成，此举可确保这个东南亚最大经济体的政策连续性。【原文：Indonesia’s President-elect Prabowo Subianto said that his cabinet may consist of “many ministers” serving under incumbent leader Joko Widodo, a move that could ensure policy continuity in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 欧盟测试银行家对全洲证券化债务的支持度
item.description: 欧盟正在推进促进其资产支持证券市场发展的计划，为广泛的潜在措施收集金融业的反馈意见，其中包括一个覆盖整个欧洲大陆的证券化平台。【原文：The European Union is moving ahead with plans to boost its asset-backed securities market by gathering financial industry feedback for a wide range of potential measures, including a continent-wide securitization platform.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国司法部正在考虑历史性地解散谷歌垄断案。飓风 "米尔顿 "正逼近佛罗里达州，威胁着人们的生活和商业。波音公司与其最大工会的谈判破裂，波音已撤回其合同报价。以下是市场动态— Morwenna Coniam。【原文：Good morning. The Department of Justice is considering a historic breakup of Google in its monopoly case. Hurricane Milton is approaching Florida, threatening lives and businesses. And Boeing has withdrawn its contract offer as talks with its biggest union break down. Here’s what’s moving markets — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: OpenAI 称与中国有关联的组织试图对其员工进行网络钓鱼
item.description:
未成功的尝试包括冒充 ChatGPT 用户。【原文：

The unsuccessful effort involved posing as a ChatGPT user.

item.title: 伯克希尔日元债券销售引发日本新投资热潮
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. is poised to sell multi-tranche yen bonds on Thursday amid growing speculation whether the legendary investor is increasing his exposure to Japanese assets.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称 "推理 "人工智能将取决于更便宜的计算技术
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，人工智能的未来将是能够 "推理 "的服务，但这样的阶段需要首先降低计算成本。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said that the future of artificial intelligence will be services that can “reason,” but such a stage requires the cost of computing to come down first.】

item.title: 交易员保罗-帕克加入健康风险投资公司 Flagship Pioneering
item.description: 保罗-帕克（Paul Parker）曾是一名并购银行家，后转为医疗保健行业高管，他将加入 Flagship Pioneering Inc.【原文：Paul Parker, a former mergers and acquisitions banker turned health-care executive, is joining Flagship Pioneering Inc., the investment firm that created Covid-vaccine maker Moderna Inc.】

item.title: 阿根廷最大银行停业 30 年后欲出售债务
item.description: 阿根廷最大银行的新任行长正在对该机构进行哈维尔-米莱式的全面改革，并计划 30 年来首次重返国际资本市场。【原文：The new head of Argentina’s largest bank is embarking on a Javier Milei-style overhaul of the institution and planning its return to international capital markets for the first time in 30 years.】

item.title: 三位科学家因蛋白质研究获得化学诺贝尔奖
item.description: 三位科学家因对蛋白质的突破性研究而获得诺贝尔化学奖。【原文：Three scientists were awarded the Nobel Prize in chemistry for breakthrough research into proteins.】

item.title: 卡扎克称，若通胀率为 2%，欧洲央行利率可在 2025 年保持中性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，如果通胀率达到2%的目标，明年可以将利率下调至既不刺激也不限制经济的水平。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said interest rates can be lowered next year to levels that neither stimulate nor restrict the economy — should inflation meet the 2% target.】

item.title: 拜耳股价在多氯联苯案获得美国法院复审后下跌
item.description: 拜耳公司（Bayer AG）股价下跌，此前华盛顿州最高法院表示，将对孟山都（Monsanto）旗下公司被控接触该公司有毒化学品导致三名教师脑部受伤的案件进行复审。【原文：Bayer AG shares fell after Washington state’s top court said it will review a case against its Monsanto unit over allegations that exposure to the firm’s toxic chemicals caused brain injuries to three teachers.】

item.title: 新兴市场股市将面临八月以来最大的两日跌幅
item.description: 新兴市场股市连续第二天下跌，原因是市场对中国如何应对世界第二大经济体的疲软感到担忧。新兴市场股票连续第二天下跌。【原文：Emerging-market stocks fell for a second day as concerns accumulated over China’s response to the weakness in the world’s no. 2 economy.】

item.title: 土耳其将恢复可再生能源拍卖以促进投资
item.description: 据知情官员透露，土耳其计划在 2035 年前每年提供至少 2000 兆瓦的新增可再生能源发电能力，以加快该行业的投资。【原文：Turkey plans to offer at least 2,000MW of new renewable energy capacity each year until 2035 in a bid to accelerate investment in the sector, according to officials with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储减息预期减弱，美元将创 2022 年以来最佳涨势
item.description: 美元有望创下两年多来的最佳表现，因为美国经济的韧性迫使交易商再次重新考虑他们对美联储更积极降息的押注。【原文：The dollar is on track for its best run in more than two years as US economic resilience forces traders once again to rethink their bets for more aggressive Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 马士基和赫伯罗特计划 2025 年在非洲南部航行
item.description: A.P. Moller Maersk A/S和赫伯罗特股份公司这两家集装箱巨头开始了船舶共享合作，它们计划开始在非洲南部航行，这表明它们预计红海到2025年仍将不安全。【原文：A.P. Moller Maersk A/S and Hapag-Lloyd AG, the two container giants starting a vessel-sharing cooperation, plan to begin their partnership sailing south of Africa, indicating they expect the Red Sea to remain unsafe well into 2025.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔在没有关键数据的情况下不相信 10 月份会降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔说，他不像一些媒体报道的那样肯定下周会降息；他建议今年的最后一次会议可能是再次降息的更合适时机。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir said he’s not as sure as some media reports that interest rates will be lowered next week — suggesting that the final meeting of the year may be a more appropriate time to cut again.】

item.title: 尽管经济不景气，德国公共部门员工仍希望加薪
item.description: 威尔第（Verdi）工会主席弗兰克-韦内克（Frank Werneke）表示，德国公共部门的工人不会因为今年经济将再次萎缩而放缓对薪酬的要求。【原文：German public-sector workers won’t moderate their pay demand just because the economy is headed for another contraction this year, according to Verdi union chief Frank Werneke.】

item.title: 华尔街薪资从流行病高点进一步下滑
item.description: 2023 年，由于利润从大流行病期间达到的高点回落，纽约市证券业的薪资连续第二年下降。【原文：Salaries in New York City’s securities industry fell for a second consecutive year in 2023 as profits retreated from highs reached during the pandemic.】

item.title: 德意志银行向摩根士丹利寻求德国商业银行建议
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）一直在与包括摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在内的顾问商谈，以帮助评估针对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）可能收购竞争对手德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）可能采取的应对措施，因为德意志银行希望在不断变化的形势中做好准备。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has been speaking with advisers including Morgan Stanley to help evaluate possible responses to UniCredit SpA’s potential takeover of competitor Commerzbank AG, as it wants to remain prepared in an evolving situation.】

item.title: 新加坡华侨银行停止与俄罗斯相关的交易以降低风险
item.description: 中国华侨银行（Oversea-China Banking Corp. ）将停止处理任何涉及俄罗斯的交易，以减少与受到全球制裁的俄罗斯的交易。【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. will stop handling any transactions involving Russia as it moves to cut exposure to the nation hit with global sanctions.】

item.title: 中国人民币垃圾企业债券将迎来十年来最糟糕的一天
item.description: 由于投资者期待政府采取更多措施提振经济，中国在岸高收益债市场正遭遇多年来最糟糕的交易日。【原文：China’s onshore high-yield debt market is suffering its worst day of trading in years as investors are on the lookout for more government measures to boost the economy.】

item.title: 希腊股市有望获得富时罗素的发达市场评级
item.description: 随着希腊逐步恢复正常，摆脱了长达十年的债务危机，希腊股市距离再次加入发达市场的行列又近了一步。【原文：Greek stocks are one step closer to joining the developed markets universe once again as the country gradually returns to normalcy, leaving behind its decade long debt crisis.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司撤回电动汽车计划，高管将离职
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司正在调整其管理团队，首席商务官兼副首席执行官比约恩-安沃尔（Bjorn Annwall）将离开公司。【原文：Volvo Car AB is shaking up its management team, with Chief Commercial Officer and Deputy Chief Executive Officer Bjorn Annwall leaving the company.】

item.title: 据说 MMC 港口将考虑进行十多年来马来西亚最大规模的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，MMC 港口控股有限公司正在考虑在吉隆坡进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达 70 亿林吉特（约合 16 亿美元），这将成为马来西亚十多年来规模最大的一次公开募股。【原文：MMC Port Holdings Sdn. is considering an initial public offering in Kuala Lumpur that could raise as much as 7 billion ringgit ($1.6 billion), people familiar with the matter said, which would make it the biggest in Malaysia in more than a decade.】

item.title: StanChart 印度首席执行官达鲁瓦拉将于四月退休
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）印度和东南亚地区首席执行官扎林-达鲁瓦拉（Zarin Daruwala）将于 4 月 1 日退休，此前他已在该职位上任职八年多。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc’s chief executive officer for India and Southeast Asia, Zarin Daruwala, will retire April 1 after serving more than eight years in the role.】

item.title: Blackstone 为 Acuity 提供 6 亿美元私人信用贷款
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已向 Permira Holdings LLP 拥有的研究和数据公司 Acuity Knowledge Partners 提供了 6 亿美元的私人信用贷款。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has provided a $600 million private credit loan to Acuity Knowledge Partners, a research and data company owned by Permira Holdings LLP., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 碧桂园错过重组支持的目标日期
item.description: 中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co. has missed a self-imposed target date for getting key creditor support for terms of its restructuring plan, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班称欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税将适得其反
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）抨击欧盟在制定环保目标时没有考虑到欧洲大陆汽车工业的利益。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban slammed the European Union for what he said was a failure to take into account the interests of the continent’s car industry in setting environmental goals.】

item.title: 致命的马尔堡病毒为何对非洲的威胁与日俱增？
item.description: 截至 10 月初，马尔堡病毒已在卢旺达造成 12 人死亡，这也是该国首次确诊爆发这种致死率接近 90% 的高致病性疾病。马尔堡病毒与埃博拉病毒同属一个家族，主要在中非和南部非洲偶尔爆发和出现零星病例，直到 2021 年 8 月西非的几内亚确认了一个致命病例。随后几年，它首次在非洲大陆的其他国家出现。【原文：Marburg virus had killed 12 people in Rwanda as of early October, touching off the nation’s first confirmed outbreak of the highly virulent disease that can have a fatality rate of close to 90%. From the same family as the Ebola virus, Marburg caused occasional outbreaks and sporadic cases mostly in Central and Southern Africa until Guinea, in West Africa, confirmed a single, deadly case in August 2021.
